name: Pollution War
description:
This prototipe of Serious Game was developed as part as David Real's Bachelor's Degree Final Project, as well as the design of all the elements that appear in it.

Besides, with this prototipe, a test was carried out with a sample of the target audience in the city of Jaén. With the data obtained in that test, a study was made on the impact that the serious game could have if it was distributed to schools throughout Spain.
